law.catch_line: A cooperative may amend its articles of incorporation as provided in this section....

text.section: A cooperative may amend its articles of incorporation as provided in this section.

section.section: A proposed amendment shall be submitted for consideration at an annual or special meeting of the members of the cooperative.
The proposed amendment shall be included in or attached to the notice of the meeting.
The proposed amendment and any change to the proposed amendment shall be approved by the affirmative vote of not less than two-thirds of the members voting on the matter.

text.section:
If the proposed amendment and any change to the proposed amendment are approved by the members as provided in subsection (b) of this section:
Articles of amendment shall be signed and acknowledged for the cooperative by its chairman or vice-chairman and attested by its secretary; and
The seal of the cooperative shall be affixed to the articles.

The chairman or vice-chairman who signs the articles of amendment for the cooperative shall make and attach to the articles an affidavit stating that the cooperative has complied with the provisions of this section that relate to the articles.
